comments:
3.2 M6

There is no way to exist a properties dialog if a property page behaves incorrectly (for example, throws exceptions). There must be a way for users to cancel the dialog. Currently, I have to kill Eclipse.

I think the problem I hit was that one page throws an exception in its #dispose implementation. This exception is thrown and logged everytime I click on cancel. But the properties dialog does stays open.
